org.akbank4j.core.api

Interface IExchangeRates

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAkbank
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Akbank

    public interface IExchangeRates
    ExchangeRates API size güncel ve geçmiş döviz kurları edinmenize izin verir.
    Author:
    Onur Arslan onurarslan.org

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> getExchangeRates()
      Güncel dövüz kuru verir.
      Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> getExchangeRates(String param, String value, boolean isTwoParam)
      isTwoParam false ise; parametre tipi ve değeri gönderilir.

    • Method Detail

      • getExchangeRates

        Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> getExchangeRates()
        Güncel dövüz kuru verir. 
         Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> exchangeRate = akbank.getExchangeRates();
        Returns:
        Akbank4J

      • getExchangeRates

        Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> getExchangeRates(String param,
                                              String value,
                                              boolean isTwoParam)
        isTwoParam false ise; parametre tipi ve değeri gönderilir. 
         Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> exchangeRate = akbank.getExchangeRates(AkbankParameters.ExchangeRates.DATE, "2016-02-01", false);
 Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> exchangeRate = akbank.getExchangeRates(AkbankParameters.ExchangeRates.CURRENCY_CODE, "002", false);
        isTwoParam true ise; iki tane parametre aynı anda gönderilecektir. İlk parametreye currencyCode, ikinci parametreye date yazılır. 
         Akbank4J<ExchangeRatesModel> exchangeRate = akbank.getExchangeRates("001", "2015-10-08", true);
        Parameters:
        param - tek parametre/currencyCode
        value - tek parametre değeri/date
        isTwoParam - tek parametre ise false çift ise true
        Returns:
        Akbank4J
